item.title: As Apple TV+ Raises Prices, Soccer Fans Score Big With Nearly 70 Percent Off Apple’s MLS Season Pass
item.description: The discount comes after Sunday’s Leagues Cup game — plus, here’s how to get Apple TV+ with MLS Season Pass for free.
